Digicel Top Up is now Digicel International and it gives you a click to more. With its new features: Send Money, where you’ll be able to do international money transfers, and Digital Cards, a service where you can provide your loved ones with prepaid Digital Cards. As well as the ones you already love like Top Up & Bill Pay.

Digicel Top Up is now Digicel International and it gives you a click to more. With its new features: Send Money, where you’ll be able to do international money transfers, and Digital Cards, a service where you can provide your loved ones with prepaid Digital Cards. As well as the ones you already love like Top Up & Bill Pay.

Thanks to the feedback from our customers we've improved Digicel International:

- Bug fixes
- Onboarding improvements

Thanks to the feedback from our customers we've improved Digicel International:

- Bug fixes
- Onboarding improvements

We’ve been listening to you, and we made some changes to the Digicel International App. The new App release contains:
- Bug fixes and app performance improvements
